data.title: Shows A-Z - futurama on hulu
data.text:
view all related dvds | view all related news | view all related listings

[07/27/24 - 11:55 AM]

Hulu's "Futurama" Season 12 Guest Stars Announcement

During the show's San Diego Comic-Con panel, Matt Groening, David X. Cohen and the cast revealed the guest stars of the upcoming season.

[07/12/24 - 09:01 AM]

Disney Entertainment Television Announces 2024 San Diego Comic-Con Programming

"Abbott Elementary" will reach new heights at San Diego Comic-Con, inviting attendees to experience A.V.A. Fest (A Very Abbott Festival) firsthand.

[07/08/24 - 08:11 AM]

Video: Trailer and Key Art Debut - Hulu's "Futurama"

Season 12 of "Futurama" will premiere on Monday, July 29 on Hulu.

[04/04/24 - 09:31 AM]

Hulu Originals & Exclusives Spring/Summer 2024 Programming Slate

Newly announced return dates include "Hit-Monkey" (July 15), "Futurama" (July 29) and "Solar Opposites" (August 12).

[12/04/23 - 04:01 AM]

Disney+ Is Just Getting Started: Non-Stop New Exclusives Coming in 2024

"Shogun," "Renegade Nell," "Rivals," "Star Wars: The Acolyte" and "Agatha: Darkhold Diaries" are among the featured titles coming to UK & Ireland next year.

[11/02/23 - 08:18 AM]

Hulu Renews "Futurama" for Two More Seasons

Season 12 is expected to debut on Hulu in 2024.

[08/23/23 - 11:06 AM]

Hulu Originals & Exclusives - Fall 2023 Programming Slate

New date announcements include "The D'Amelio Show" Season Three, "Living for the Dead," "Self Reliance," "Black Cake," and "Monster Inside: America's Most Extreme Haunted House."

[06/27/23 - 09:07 AM]

Video: Trailer & Key Art Debut - Hulu Original "Futurama"

After a brief ten-year hiatus, "Futurama" has crawled triumphantly from the cryogenic tube, its full original cast and satirical spirit intact.

[05/19/23 - 09:00 AM]

Hulu Originals & Exclusives Summer 2023 Programming Slate

New date announcements include "Only Murders in the Building" Season Three, "This Fool" season two, "Secrets & Sisterhood: The Sozahdahs," "Secret Chef," "Miguel Wants to Fight" and "The Jewel Thief."

[05/18/23 - 09:35 AM]

Date Announcement: Hulu Original "Futurama"

Season 11 of "Futurama" is set to premiere on July 24 with new episodes released weekly on Mondays.

[03/01/22 - 11:07 PM]

Development Update: Tuesday, March 1

Updates include: John DiMaggio to return for Hulu's "Futurama" revival; Tim Robinson to star in HBO Max's "Computer School" pilot; and Barry Levinson, Richard Shepard land directing gigs.

[02/09/22 - 12:40 PM]

"Futurama" Lands Future at Hulu with New Episodes

"I'm thrilled to have another chance to think about the future... or really anything other than the present," said David X. Cohen.

[09/17/21 - 12:08 PM]

Full "Family Guy" Catalog of Past Seasons Moves to FXX This Monday, September 20

"Futurama" joins this powerhouse comedy line-up in November 2021.

[11/21/18 - 08:08 AM]

Comedy Central Celebrates "31 Days of Holiday Survival"

Highlights include the season finales of "South Park" (December 12) and "This Week at the Comedy Cellar" (December 14).

[11/01/18 - 01:44 PM]

Hulu Adds "King of The Hill" and Locks in Exclusive Streaming Rights to "Family Guy," "Bob's Burgers," "American Dad!," "The Cleveland Show" and "Futurama"

Hulu has added all 13 seasons of "King of The Hill" exclusively to its service.

[05/23/18 - 08:01 AM]

Netflix Reveals First Look and Launch Date for "Disenchantment"

The series will feature the voice talents of Abbi Jacobson, Nat Faxon and Eric Andre, along with John DiMaggio, Billy West, Maurice LaMarche, Tress MacNeille, David Herman, Matt Berry, Jeny Batten, Rich Fulcher, Noel Fielding, and Lucy Montgomery.

[04/16/18 - 08:06 AM]

Syfy Gets High on Hypnotoad for 4/20

Look for a special six-hour marathon of "Futurama" this Friday beginning at 8:00/7:00c.

[10/12/17 - 12:43 PM]

Hulu (Finally) Brings Back "Futurama"

On Monday, October 16, the entire "Futurama" library - including all four films - will make their long-awaited streaming return, only on Hulu.

[10/03/17 - 10:00 AM]

Syfy Acquires Iconic Animated Series "Futurama" from Twentieth Television

"Futurama" will make its Syfy debut in a special weekend stunt beginning Saturday, November 11, with the series airing regularly in primetime on Mondays and Tuesdays from 8PM-2AM ET/PT and on Saturday mornings from 8-11AM ET/PT.

[07/25/17 - 08:05 AM]

Netflix Announces "Disenchantment," a New Epic Fantasy Animated Series from Matt Groening

Viewers will be whisked away to the crumbling medieval kingdom of Dreamland, where they will follow the misadventures of hard-drinking young princess Bean, her feisty elf companion Elfo, and her personal demon Luci.

[07/15/14 - 08:41 AM]

Comedy Central(R) Jumps the Shark When It Unleashes... "Shart Week 2014," A Weeklong Exhibition of the Finest in Poop-Themed Programming, Beginning Sunday, August 3 at 8:00 P.M. ET/PT

"Tosh.0," "Futurama," "South Park," "Workaholics," "Chappelle's Show" and "Key & Peele" are among the themed episodes.

[07/10/14 - 11:40 AM]

Comedy Central(R) Honored with a Record 21 Primetime Emmy(R) Nominations

"The Daily Show with Jon Stewart" (6), "The Colbert Report" (6), "Key & Peele" (4), "Futurama" (2), "South Park," "Inside Amy Schumer" and "@midnight" all received nominations.

[11/08/13 - 06:31 PM]

FOX Visits "Bordertown" with 13-Episode Order

"Family Guy's" Mark Hentemann and Seth MacFarlane are behind the animated comedy, which is expected to debut during the 2014-2015 season.

[08/29/13 - 07:33 AM]

"Futurama" Series Finale Blasts Off with "Futurama Live!"

Chris Hardwick will host the pre- and post-shows surrounding Wednesday's series finale on Comedy Central.

[07/21/13 - 11:24 PM]

Development Update: Sunday, July 21

Updates include: The CW eyes "Supernatural" spin-off; "The Simpsons" is host a crossover with "Futurama"; and Stephen Collins to visit NBC's "Revolution."

[07/09/13 - 02:06 PM]

Comedy Central Is Coming to San Diego Comic-Con 2013

"Workaholics," "South Park," "Brickleberry" and "Futurama" are among the featured panels.

[07/08/13 - 07:10 PM]

Q2 in Review: How 436 Original Primetime Cable Series Fared in the Ratings

A recap of the ratings to date through the second quarter of 2013.

[06/19/13 - 11:17 PM]

Development Update: Wednesday, June 19

Updates include: James Gandolfini passes away at age 51; ReelzChannel nixes "The Big Picture" prior to premiere; and Sienna Guillory to depart NBC's "Believe."

[06/12/13 - 11:27 AM]

Twentieth Century Fox Television to Dominate Comic-Con 2013 with Eleven Drama, Comedy and Animation Panels

On tap are newcomers "Sleepy Hollow" and "Murder Police" as well as first appearance of "How I Met Your Mother" at the annual event.

[05/24/13 - 01:35 PM]

Mike Darnell Votes Himself Out... of Fox Broadcasting Company

The longtime President of Alternative Entertainment has announced that he will be departing the network at the end of June.

[05/06/13 - 09:00 AM]

Comedy Central to Premiere "Kumail Nanjiani: Beta Male" and "Owen Benjamin: High Five Til It Hurts" in June

They'll join the previously announced swan song for "Futurama" as well as John Oliver's turn as guest host of "The Daily Show with Jon Stewart."

[05/02/13 - 11:09 PM]

Development Update: Thursday, May 2

Updates include: Dwayne Johnson to topline HBO comedy pilot; Drew Pinsky nixes VH1's "Rehab with Dr. Drew"; and Blake McCormick named showrunner of TBS's "Cougar Town."

[05/01/13 - 11:44 AM]

Video: The Future Is Near! Get Ready for the Final Season Premiere of "Futurama" with the "50 Day Countdown"

Every day for 50 days the network will release a new piece of exclusive content from the show.

[04/22/13 - 10:02 AM]

"Futurama" Blasts Into Its Final Frontier.... Again! Final Season of the Emmy(R) Award-Winning Comedy Series to Premiere Wednesday June 19, 2013 at 10:00 P.M.

Special guest stars for the final season include Larry Bird, Dan Castellaneta, Sarah Silverman, George Takei, Adam West and Burt Ward.

[02/05/13 - 11:27 AM]

Video: "Futurama" Returns This Summer! Here's a Sneak Peak!

Watch the trailer for the show's upcoming installments.

[11/01/12 - 09:32 AM]

Dan is Back for a New Season of Avenging Grudges with Season Premiere of "Dan Vs." November 17 on The Hub TV Network

Upcoming guest stars include Jenna Fischer, Felicia Day, Kurtwood Smith, Rex Lee, Maurice LaMarche, Clancy Brown, Ernie Hudson, Seth Green and Tom Kenny.

[09/24/12 - 09:54 AM]

Comedy Central(R) Wins Three Primetime Emmy(R) Awards for "The Daily Show with Jon Stewart" and "Futurama"

"Futurama's" Maurice LaMarche earned his second consecutive Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance.

[09/15/12 - 07:53 PM]

The 64th Primetime Creative Arts Emmys Winners

HBO took home 17 awards, followed by CBS with 13 and PBS with 11.

[08/27/12 - 08:06 AM]

Get Ready for the One-Hour Mid-Season Finale of "Futurama" with Two Episodes Back to Back Wednesday, August 29

Patrick Stewart lends his voice to the opening installment, "31st Century Fox."

[08/21/12 - 07:30 AM]

Welcome to the Wilderness! New Animated Series "Brickleberry" Premieres on Tuesday, September 25 at 10:30 P.M.

As previously announced, the Daniel Tosh-led series will follow the fall run of "Tosh.0."

[08/07/12 - 11:16 AM]

"Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja," an Animated Comedy About an Unlikely Ninja Hero and His Best Buddy, Premieres Monday, September 17 on Disney XD

New episodes will premiere Monday through Thursday at 7:00/6:00c on the cable channel.

Comedy Central(R) Honored With 12 Primetime Emmy(R) Nominations

Comedy Central(R) and Matt Groening Announce the Launch of the New "Futurama Head-In-A-Jar Creator" App

The free app, which was a huge success on iOS, is now also available for Android users and is loaded with a wealth of additional features.

Join in for the First "Futurama" Live-Stream Chat With the Producers and Talent from the Emmy-Award(R) Winning Series Wednesday, July 11 at 10:30 P.M.

Comedy Central: September 2010 Programming Highlights
